the truth is I'm surviving everything

twice you see the problem
Clive I'd like to ask you about the
issue of talking about death whether
that's how you talk about it to your

you're talking about it in your work as
well how easy or difficult has that been
for you with my loved ones I just try to

it's going to happen to everyone for
example it really is universal moreso
than love once or twice during my career
I've interviewed people who are
effectively expecting to die and a

feel there's a a new clarity a new

because when I was young and had lots of
energy
I was a real bundle of energy

it goes on far too casually I broke

my granddaughter as quick as I could

you do read well and I'm particularly

and I love writing about she's only 10
